data.title: Denver Nuggets NBA awards: All the winners in team history
data.meta_description: These are all the NBA awards and accolades received by members of the Denver Nuggets. To see the awards for all NBA teams, go here. Defensive Player of the Year (2) Marcus Camby, 2007 (age 33) Dikembe Mutombo, 1995 (age 29) Most Improved Player (1) Mahmoud Abdul-Rauf, 1993 (age 24) All-NBA...
data.text:
These are all the NBA awards and accolades received by members of the Denver Nuggets.

To see the awards for all NBA teams, go here.

Defensive Player of the Year (2)

Marcus Camby, 2007 (age 33)

Dikembe Mutombo, 1995 (age 29)

Most Improved Player (1)

Mahmoud Abdul-Rauf, 1993 (age 24)

All-NBA 1st Team (3)

Nikola Jokic, 2019 (age 24)

David Thompson, 1978 (age 23)

David Thompson, 1977 (age 22)

All-NBA 2nd Team (6)

Nikola Jokic, 2020 (age 25)

Carmelo Anthony, 2010 (age 26)

Fat Lever, 1987 (age 26)

Alex English, 1986 (age 32)

Alex English, 1983 (age 29)

Alex English, 1982 (age 28)

Carmelo Anthony, 2007 (age 23)
